feed.title: Planka Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Planka: v1.23.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: Add multiple task creation with Ctrl+Enter (#921)
  • feat: Improve UX of comment actions (#924)
  • fix: Update Czech translation (#920)

New Contributors

  • @Zananok made their first contribution in https://github.com/plankanban/planka/pull/921

Full Changelog: https://github.com/plankanban/planka/compare/v1.23.3...v1.23.4

entry.title: New release for Planka: planka-0.2.14
entry.content: A Helm chart to deploy Planka and it's dependencies.

entry.title: New release for Planka: v1.23.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: Telegram bot notifications (#928)
  • fix: Include previous data state in webhook
  • fix: Save description when clicking outside

New Contributors

  • @Elllone made their first contribution in https://github.com/plankanban/planka/pull/928

Full Changelog: https://github.com/plankanban/planka/compare/v1.23.4...v1.23.5

entry.title: New release for Planka: planka-0.2.15
entry.content: A Helm chart to deploy Planka and it's dependencies.

entry.title: New release for Planka: v1.24.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: Add S3 support for uploads (#938)
  • fix: Use planka.fullname for postgres secret name in Helm (#939)
  • fix: Secure S3 attachments, bump SDK, refactoring

New Contributors

  • @haiquang9994 made their first contribution in https://github.com/plankanban/planka/pull/938
  • @janwels89 made their first contribution in https://github.com/plankanban/planka/pull/939

Full Changelog: https://github.com/plankanban/planka/compare/v1.23.5...v1.24.0
